============================================
core/subroutines/call_method_with_constant_bit_select
============================================

function void foo();
    this.in_use[0].get_start_offset();
endfunction

----

(source_file
  (function_declaration
    (function_body_declaration
      (data_type_or_void)
      name: (simple_identifier)
      (function_statement_or_null
        (function_statement
          (statement
            (statement_item
              (subroutine_call_statement
                (subroutine_call
                  (method_call
                    (implicit_class_handle)
                    (select
                      (simple_identifier)
                      (bit_select
                        (expression
                          (primary
                            (primary_literal
                              (integral_number
                                (decimal_number
                                  (unsigned_number))))))))
                    (method_call_body
                      name: (simple_identifier))))))))))))
